key_low.description: Lowest key number (note number) in the keymap. This value is intended to be used as information for mapping with third-party sampler software.

key_high.description: Highest key number (note number) in the keymap. This value is intended to be used as information for mapping with third-party sampler software.

key_root.description: Root key number (note number) in the keymap. This value is intended to be used as information for mapping note-on messages sent to MIDI devices and third-party sampler software when sampling.
